product_name: Amphipod Hydraform Handheld Ergo-Lite Water Bottle - 10.5 fl. oz.
long_description: With an updated, streamlined storage pocket and insulation sleeve, the Amphipod Hydraform Handheld Ergo-Lite water bottle comfortably holds essentials and helps keep your beverage cool while you run. Leak-free, 10.5-oz. water bottle isn't too big or too small; ergonomically-shaped bottle helps eliminate hand tension and fatigue. Comfortable Thumb-lock(TM) sleeve lets the bottle rest naturally in your palm without requiring you to grasp it. Integrated insulator sleeve can be removed for easy cleaning of the bottle and sleeve. Adjustable strap on the Amphipod Hydraform Handheld Ergo-Lite water bottle ensures a secure fit; integrated, zippered pocket holds your cash, ID, and a key.
short_description: With an updated, streamlined storage pocket and insulation sleeve, the Amphipod Hydraform Handheld Ergo-Lite water bottle comfortably holds essentials and helps keep your beverage cool while you run.
